Title: Xinx Remote Screen
Description:
Remote Screen (RS) is a Client /server App.
Remote Screen makes it possible for network/ internet users to "View" remote users  screen on which  "XRS" Server is running with the help of a Browser or "XRS" client, though you can not control remote computer.
Developed in .NET/C#

Project Description
Remote Screen (RS) is a Client /server App.
